note.p: Natural history artist. Daughter of the baillie John M’Intosh of St Andrews and Elizabeth Mitchell. Met Albert Günther at the British Association for the Advancement of Science meeting in Dundee in 1867, and married him in 1868. Died after giving birth to her son, Robert William Theodore Gunther.
ODNB s.v. Günther, Albert Charles Lewis Gotthilf, and Gunther, Robert William Theodore.
